page.title: 11LOCAL CHARACTER MRS SOULT
page.content: We interviewed Mrs.Kay Soult who lives in Flushing. She is a local charactor,who has been in Cornwall all her life. First of all she taught at Flushing Primary School. Then the Goverment made a rule that all children over the age of eleven had to go to a secondary school. This was situated in Penryn, but until the new school was built they used temporary buildings down at the quarry in Falmouth. In 1961 Penryn Comprehensive School was opened. Mrs.Kay Soult came to this school with all the children. Here she taught the remedials. Mrs. soult retired in 1981 after many happy years of teaching.
